xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: GitLabApp Translations
xwikidoc.content:
gitlab.title=GitLab Commit Application gitlab.description=Welcome to the GitLab Commit App. You can configure GitLab repositories to connect to your wiki and commit your wiki content in these repositories. gitlab.currentconfigs.title=Current GitLab configs gitlab.currentconfigs.noconfigs=There are currently no configs created gitlab.createnewconfig=Create new GitLab config gitlab.createnewimport.error.titlemissing=A title is needed when creating an GitLab config
gitlab.configsheet.header.projectConfig=Project configuration gitlab.configsheet.header.repositoryConfig=Repository configuration gitlab.configsheet.header.commitConfig=Commit configuration
gitlab.configsheet.title=GitLab Repository Configuration gitlab.configsheet.compare.title=Differences for gitlab.configsheet.debug=Debug gitlab.configsheet.commitmessage=Commit message gitlab.configsheet.commitpom=Commit Maven POM File gitlab.configsheet.listpages=List pages to commit gitlab.configsheet.commitall=Commit gitlab.configsheet.updateall=Update gitlab.configsheet.exportall=Export gitlab.configsheet.commit=Commit gitlab.configsheet.viewdoc=View doc gitlab.configsheet.viewdiff=View diff gitlab.configsheet.viewdiffunformatted=View diff unformatted gitlab.configsheet.committingpages=Committing the following pages gitlab.configsheet.committsuccessfull=Commit finished successfully gitlab.configsheet.backtolist=Back to the list of pages to commit gitlab.configsheet.backtocustom=Back to the custom list of pages to commit gitlab.configsheet.confirmcommittingpage=Please confirm commiting the following page(s) gitlab.configsheet.custom.spacelist=Space List (separated by commas) gitlab.configsheet.custom.space=Space gitlab.configsheet.customlist=Custom List of pages gitlab.configsheet.pagesupdated=The following pages have been updated from GitLab gitlab.configsheet.select=Select gitlab.configsheet.select.all=all gitlab.configsheet.select.none=none
GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_name=Project Name GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_description=Project Description GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_version=Project version GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_branch=Branch GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_branch_tooltip=Branch to commit to. The branch should already exist on the remote repository. Defaults to "master". GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_user=Repository owner GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_user_tooltip=Group or user that owns the GitLab repository. If the owner is a subgroup, use the following syntax : "parentGroup/subGroup". GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_name=Repository Name GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_name_tooltip=GitLab repository name where to commit the wiki pages GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_path=Path to the module GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_repository_path_tooltip=Path to the module that will contain the committed wiki pages (for example : wikis/main). GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_username=Username GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_username_tooltip=Username to connect to the GitLab repository GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_password=Password GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_password_tooltip=Password to connect to the GitLab repository GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultgitlabspace=Default space list GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultspace_tooltip=Space list to check pages to commit in GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_savedlist=Saved list GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_savedlist_tooltip=saved list to check pages - from MultiPageExport - to commit in GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultdate=Default date GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultdate_tooltip=Date to set all pages we commit to GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_removeDates=Remove dates GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_removeDates_tooltip=If set to true, the dates of the documents and their attachments will be removed before commit. GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultuser=Default user GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultuser_tooltip=User to set all pages we commit to GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_license=License GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_license_tooltip=Document that contains the license that will be added on top of every committed page. If this field is left empty, no license will be added. GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_parentDefinitionStrategy=Parent definition strategy GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_parentDefinitionStrategy_tooltip=Behavior to apply towards the parent attribute of committed wiki pages GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_parentDefinitionStrategy_setDefault=Set ${doc.space}.WebHome as the parent if nothing is defined GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_parentDefinitionStrategy_keepAsIs=Keep the parent field as-is GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_parentDefinitionStrategy_remove=Remove the parent field GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultLanguageDefinitionStrategy=Default language definition strategy GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultLanguageDefinitionStrategy_tooltip=Behavior to apply towards the defaultLanguage attribute of the documents GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultLanguageDefinitionStrategy_keepAsIs=Keep the defaultLanguage field as-is GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultLanguageDefinitionStrategy_blankIfNotTranslation=Empty the defaultLanguage if the document is not a translation document GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_defaultLanguageDefinitionStrategy_alwaysBlank=Always empty the defaultLanguage GitLab.Code.GitLabConfigClass_status=Commit Status
GitLab.Code.GitLabAuthClass_username=GitLab User GitLab.Code.GitLabAuthClass_password=GitLab Password
platform.core.profile.category.gitlab=GitLab gitlab.profilesheet.title=GitLab Authentication gitlab.profilesheet.newAuthObjectSaveComment=Create GitLab Authentication object gitlab.profilesheet.noAuthObject=No authentication object defined. Edit your profile to create one. gitlab.profilesheet.description=You can define a token to be used with the GitLab Commit application in any project in your wikis. If you need to override this token for a specific project, simply define it in the project configuration page.
